section.p: You are accosted by the side of the street by a blind man who stares at you with milky-white eyes. ‘Travel straight to the woods from here,’ he hisses in a tone of great urgency. ‘Go upstream and look for a door under an old oak. Take the left-hand path.’
He veers off, tapping the boardwalk with his cane, and is lost in the crowd. A strange encounter.
